entry.title: A little tip to improve rust-analyzer memory usage
entry.summary: Rust-Analyzer is a LSP server for IDEs like VSCode, Emacs, Vim etc. However it suffers from very high memory usage in some use cases. This blog post provides a tip to reduce memory usage if you are using FFIs and bindgen in your Rust projects.

entry.title: Web fingerprinting is worse than I thought
entry.summary: Discussing current state of web fingerprinting and how to protect yourself

entry.title: Quick guide to basic Date/Time operations in Haskell
entry.summary: Explaining how to consume frequently used date/time functions in Haskell
